title: LF people to play norms/flex with
body:
Hello everyone, I am from the Netherlands staying in Auckland New Zealand for 9 months.
At home I always had people to play with, where I also became friends with and did IRL stuff all the time. It seems to be hard for me to find people on this server through discords, so I thought trying here might be different.

I always played ADC exclusively, but am willing to change it up sometimes.
